Actions.Name: Deallocate virtual machine
Actions.Description: Shuts down the virtual machine and releases the compute resources. You are not billed for the compute resources that this virtual machine uses.

Actions.Name: Power off virtual machine
Actions.Description: Power off (stop) a virtual machine. The virtual machine can be restarted with the same provisioned resources. You are still charged for this virtual machine.

Actions.Name: Redeploy virtual machine
Actions.Description: Shuts down the virtual machine, moves it to a new node, and powers it back on.

Actions.Name: Deallocate virtual machine in a VM scale set
Actions.Description: Deallocates a specific virtual machine in a VM scale set. Shuts down the virtual machine and releases the compute resources it uses. You are not billed for the compute resources of this virtual machine once it is deallocated.

Actions.Name: Get virtual machine in a VM scale set
Actions.Description: Gets a virtual machine in a VM scale set.

Actions.Name: Power off virtual machine in a VM scale set
Actions.Description: Power off (stop) a virtual machine in a VM scale set. Note that resources are still attached and you are getting charged for the resources.

Actions.Name: Redeploy virtual machine in a VM scale set
Actions.Description: Shuts down the virtual machine in the VM scale set, moves it to a new node, and powers it back on.

Actions.Name: Reimage virtual machine in a VM scale set
Actions.Description: Reimages (upgrade the operating system) a specific virtual machine in a VM scale set.

Actions.Name: Restart virtual machine in a VM scale set
Actions.Description: Restarts a virtual machine in a VM scale set.

Actions.Name: Start virtual machine in a VM scale set
Actions.Description: Starts a virtual machine in a VM scale set.
